4 Header & Footer

Here will contain most of the header, footer, landing page layout and relative basic elements.

All of Trend Micro products should contain this elements on the UI.

4.1 Header

A standard Trend Micro branding header. If you want to stick your footer on bootom, you might need to use .wrapper class in your HTML markup.

HTML markup
<div class="wrapper">
<div class="trend-header">
    <div class="trend-header-wrapper navbar clearfix container">
        <h1 class="product-name pull-left">
            <img src="img/trend/ic_logo_productsymbol.png" alt="" class="logo">
            <img src="img/trend/ic_logo_productname.png" alt="DirectPass" class="product-name">
        </h1>
        <ul class="nav pull-right">
            <li>
                <a href="#" data-i18n="herder_get_pro_subscription"></a>
            </li>
            <li>
                <a href="#" data-i18n="herder_get_help">Get Help</a>
            </li>
            <li>
                <a href="#" class="btn btn-ruby btn-small">Sign In</a>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
normal
Original status

  • Get Help
  • Sign In

4.1 Header (After sign in)

Original button should be replace by a dropdown menu to show user's information like subscription, link to Trend Micro Account or Sign out functionality.

HTML markup
<div class="wrapper">
<div class="trend-header">
    <div class="trend-header-wrapper navbar clearfix container">
        <h1 class="product-name pull-left">
            <img src="img/trend/ic_logo_productsymbol.png" alt="" class="logo">
            <img src="img/trend/ic_logo_productname.png" alt="DirectPass" class="product-name">
        </h1>
        <ul class="nav pull-right">
            <li>
                <a href="#" data-i18n="herder_get_pro_subscription"></a>
            </li>
            <li>
                <a href="#" data-i18n="herder_get_help">Get Help</a>
            </li>
            <li id="header-user" class="dropdown header-user">
                <a class="dropdown-toggle expand-down" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#" id="userMenuHeader">John Dove</a>
                <ul id="userMenu" class="dropdown-menu pull-right">
                    <li>
                        <a href="#">
                            <span data-js="menu-content" data-i18n="menu_item_expires_on">Expires on</span><span>  03/23/2014</span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <a data-js="menu-link" href="#" target="_blank">
                            <span data-js="menu-content" data-i18n="menu_item_renew_now">Renew now</span><span>  </span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <a data-js="menu-link" href="#setting">
                            <span data-js="menu-content" data-i18n="menu_item_settings">Settings</span><span>  </span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <a data-js="menu-link" href="https://account.trendmicro.com/my_account" target="_blank">
                            <span data-js="menu-content" data-i18n="menu_item_tm_account">Trend Micro Account</span><span>  </span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li class="divider"></li>
                    <li>
                        <a data-js="menu-link" href="/auth/logout">
                            <span data-js="menu-content" data-i18n="menu_item_sign_out">Sign Out</span><span>  </span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
normal
Original status

  • Get Help
  • John Dove
    • Expires on  03/23/2014
    • Renew now  
    • Settings  
    • Trend Micro Account  
    • Sign Out  

4.2 Navigator footer

A standard company sitemap footer.

HTML markup
<div class="navigator-footer layout-home">
  <div class="container">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="span5">
        <p class="navigator-footer-title">
          Security Software Products
        </p>
        <ul class="navigator-footer-items">
          <li><a href="#">Lorem ipsum sit dolor commodo</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">dolor ut nostrud consectetur fugiat</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">reprehenderit velit consectetur aute</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">proident nostrud sint quis aliqua dolore commodo laboris.</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">Lorem ipsum sit dolor commodo</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">dolor ut nostrud consectetur fugiat</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">reprehenderit velit consectetur aute</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">proident nostrud sint quis aliqua dolore commodo laboris.</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
      <div class="span5">
        <p class="navigator-footer-title">
          Security Software Products
        </p>
        <ul class="navigator-footer-items">
          <li><a href="#">Lorem ipsum sit dolor commodo</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">dolor ut nostrud consectetur fugiat</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">reprehenderit velit consectetur aute</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">proident nostrud sint quis aliqua dolore commodo laboris.</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
normal
Original status

Security Software Products

  • Lorem ipsum sit dolor commodo
  • dolor ut nostrud consectetur fugiat
  • reprehenderit velit consectetur aute
  • proident nostrud sint quis aliqua dolore commodo laboris.
  • Lorem ipsum sit dolor commodo
  • dolor ut nostrud consectetur fugiat
  • reprehenderit velit consectetur aute
  • proident nostrud sint quis aliqua dolore commodo laboris.

Security Software Products

  • Lorem ipsum sit dolor commodo
  • dolor ut nostrud consectetur fugiat
  • reprehenderit velit consectetur aute
  • proident nostrud sint quis aliqua dolore commodo laboris.

4.3 Trend Micro Footer

A standard Trend Micro branding footer style.

HTML markup
<footer class="trend-footer">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row-fluid footer-wrapper">
            <div class="footer-links">
                <div class="language dropup">
                    <a class="expand dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#">
                        English
                    </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                        <li><a href="#">Chinese</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">English</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Japanese</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <a class="link" href="#">Privacy Policy</a>
                <a class="link" href="#">Contact Us</a>
                <a class="link" href="#">TrendMicro.com</a>
            </div>
            <div class="copyright" data-i18n="copyright"></div>
            <img src="img/trend/ic_tmlogo_web.png" class="tm-logo">
        </div>
    </div>
</footer>
normal
Original status
English
  • Chinese
  • English
  • Japanese
Privacy Policy Contact Us TrendMicro.com
